name: UnitedStatesChallenge
0:
”Alexa Open United States Challenge”
”Alexa Tell United States Challenge to Start Game”
”Alexa Start United States Challenge”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: united states challenge
des:
To get started simply say: Open United States Challenge.
To start the game without the instructions simply say: tell United States Challenge to Start Game
This game will test your knowledge of US geography, History and even pop culture. Do you know all the 50 states in the union? Give it a go and don't worry, if you get stuck Alexa will be there to help. Simply name one state at a time and Alexa will confirm your answers. If you get stuck or need a hint simply say: give me a hint. If you want to start over simply say start over. Happy Learning!!
